articles.author: David Phelan
articles.title: Apple Suddenly Confirms New iPhone Update’s Controversial Surprise - Forbes
articles.description: The latest iPhone software has an unwelcome surprise for some users and Apple has just revealed more details.
articles.content: Apples latest iPhone software, iOS 17.4 is just out and comes with plenty of feature updates. But in a development to be filed under unintended consequences, a surprise detail emerged for EU users wa… [+2913 chars]
